programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Tikko bez darba palikušais Stīvs nolemj, ka viņš īsti nevēlas strādāt, tāpēc viņš pavada savas dienas ar Bandijiem, apmeklējot zoodārzu un dodoties makšķerēšanas braucienos. Tas rada spriedzi Stīva attiecībās ar Mārsiju, kura kopā ar Alu dodas uz vietējo bāru, kur viņi apmainās ar stāstiem par savām nožēlojamajām laulībām.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Beidzot Als ir iekrājis daudz naudas, lai iegādātos savai ģimenei daudz dāvanu, ko viņi šogad vēlas. Diemžēl apavu veikalā vēlu pircēju pūlis neļauj viņam nokļūt bankā un atgūt nepieciešamo naudu.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Als lietus laikā izmisīgi mēģina salabot tekošo mājas jumtu. Taču katru reizi, kad Als nokrīt no jumta, Pegijai un bērniem rodas jautājums, vai viņš nav pārāk stulbs vai pārāk taupīgs, lai izsauktu jumiķi, kas paveiktu šo darbu. Tikmēr Stīvs iegūst citu darbu zooveikalā, un Mārsija cieš no blakusparādībām pēc tam, kad viņu sakodis indīgs "Peru velna ģerbils".

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Als lietus laikā izmisīgi mēģina salabot tekošo mājas jumtu. Taču katru reizi, kad Als nokrīt no jumta, Pegijai un bērniem rodas jautājums, vai viņš nav pārāk stulbs vai pārāk taupīgs, lai izsauktu jumiķi, kas paveiktu šo darbu. Tikmēr Stīvs iegūst citu darbu zooveikalā, un Mārsija cieš no blakusparādībām pēc tam, kad viņu sakodis indīgs "Peru velna ģerbils".

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Saskaroties ar auditu Pegijas dēļ, Als nolemj ātri atrast naudu nodokļu nomaksai, pārdodot Pegijas matus par 5000 USD. Diemžēl - Pegija neplāno tuvākajā laikā atbrīvoties no saviem rudajiem matiem.

programme.title: Džeina Eira
programme.desc: Bārene Džeina Eira kļūst par guvernanti Tornfīldholā. Pirmo reizi viņa jūtas kaut kur piederīga, tomēr kādā dienā viņu pamodina dīvainas skaņas.

programme.title: Domina
programme.desc: Gaja valdīšanas laiks, par kuru stāsta viņa sieva Līvija Drusilla, kura pilnībā mainīja izpratni par to, ko sievietes varētu gaidīt no dzīves, jo viņa kļuva par pasaules ietekmīgāko sievieti.

programme.title: Domina
programme.desc: Gaja valdīšanas laiks, par kuru stāsta viņa sieva Līvija Drusilla, kura pilnībā mainīja izpratni par to, ko sievietes varētu gaidīt no dzīves, jo viņa kļuva par pasaules ietekmīgāko sievieti.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Zoja Strahana satiek brāli Bendžaminu, kurš apgalvo, ka viņam esot finansiālas problēmas. Kad tiek atklāts Bendžaminam līdzīgs līķis, Albergs uzsāk slepkavas meklējumus.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Kad strādnieka nāve izraisa streiku, Mērdokam rodas aizdomas, ka tas viss ir saistīts ar arodbiedrības veidošanos.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Pēc tikšanās ar Ogdenu kādā krodziņā Mērdoks satiek populāru detektīvu, un jauna laimes meklētāja tiek atrasta mirusi.

programme.title: Džeina Eira
programme.desc: Bārene Džeina Eira kļūst par guvernanti Tornfīldholā. Pirmo reizi viņa jūtas kaut kur piederīga, tomēr kādā dienā viņu pamodina dīvainas skaņas.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Hercogs ilgi ir prombūtnē, un jaunais detektīvinspektors liek Elīzai Skārletai cītīgi strādāt, lai iegūtu policijas resursus; pārmaiņas aktualizē vienu jautājumu - vai Elīzai patiešām var būt viss?

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Izjūtot spiedienu no mātes, Džeimss Heriots vēlas sekot sapnim, tādēļ izmanto iespēju un dodas uz veterinārārsta asistenta amata darba interviju Jorkšīrā.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Peregrīnas prieks par gaidāmajām kāzām ātri beidzas, kad stjuaršu apmācības laikā tiek atklāts mirušas sievietes ķermenis.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Eliza saskaras ar interešu konfliktu, kad viņu nolīgst noskaidrot policijas komisāra Ficroija personīgo dzīvi.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Kad Džeimss ir gandrīz iekārtojies jaunajā dzīvesvietā, ierodas Zigfrīda brālis Tristans. Zigfrīds ir priecīgs un lūdz Džeimsam ņemt līdzi Tristanu, lai pārbaudītu teoriju praksē.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Kad strādnieka nāve izraisa streiku, Mērdokam rodas aizdomas, ka tas viss ir saistīts ar arodbiedrības veidošanos.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Pēc tikšanās ar Ogdenu kādā krodziņā Mērdoks satiek populāru detektīvu, un jauna laimes meklētāja tiek atrasta mirusi.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Aktrise Marina Grega un režisors un vīrs Džeisons Rads ievācas Gosingtonholā. Kokteiļu vakarā, ko rīkoja šarmantais pāris, fane Hetera izdzer saindētu kokteili.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Peregrīnas prieks par gaidāmajām kāzām ātri beidzas, kad stjuaršu apmācības laikā tiek atklāts mirušas sievietes ķermenis.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Eliza saskaras ar interešu konfliktu, kad viņu nolīgst noskaidrot policijas komisāra Ficroija personīgo dzīvi.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Kad Džeimss ir gandrīz iekārtojies jaunajā dzīvesvietā, ierodas Zigfrīda brālis Tristans. Zigfrīds ir priecīgs un lūdz Džeimsam ņemt līdzi Tristanu, lai pārbaudītu teoriju praksē.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Karls Albergs pārceļas uz klusu piekrastes pilsētiņu, jo ir noguris no policijas darba lielpilsētā. Tomēr viņam nākas izmantot visas prasmes, lai izmeklētu slepkavības, kas arvien turpina notikt.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Aktrise Marina Grega un režisors un vīrs Džeisons Rads ievācas Gosingtonholā. Kokteiļu vakarā, ko rīkoja šarmantais pāris, fane Hetera izdzer saindētu kokteili.

programme.title: Grāmattārps
programme.desc: Ekscentrisks grāmatnīcas īpašnieks un bijušais spiegs Buks palīdz atrisināt slepkavības. Bijušais ieslodzītais Džeks sāk strādāt veikalā, kur viņu laipni uzņem, tomēr šķiet, ka ne viss ir kārtībā.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Albergs un Gibsonas policijas nodaļa strādā, lai atrastu vainīgo, kad Kasandra nonāk dzīvībai bīstamā situācijā.

programme.title: Forsaiti
programme.desc: Stāsts par Viktorijas laikmeta beigu posma ģimenes dzīvi, mīlestību, pārbaudījumiem un triumfu, kad ģimenes locekļiem jāizvēlas starp tradīcijām, ziedošanos, personīgo laimi un mīlestību.

programme.title: Women at War
programme.desc: Francija, 1914. g. Stāsts par četrām sievietēm - Parīzes prostitūtu Margeritu, ģimenes galvu Karolīnu, klostera galveno māsu Agnesi un feministiski noskaņoto māsu Suzannu.

programme.title: Women at War
programme.desc: Kad vācieši nonāk Sentpolīnā un visi ir spiesti evakuēties, palikušo saiknes tiek pārbaudītas tā, kā nekad agrāk.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Karls Albergs pārceļas uz klusu piekrastes pilsētiņu, jo ir noguris no policijas darba lielpilsētā. Tomēr viņam nākas izmantot visas prasmes, lai izmeklētu slepkavības, kas arvien turpina notikt.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Mis Mārpla iekļūst drauga Sera Henrija Kliteringa džentlmeņu klubā, lai lūgtu palīdzību. Viņai ir pierādījumi par Zilās ģerānijas slepkavību, un nepieciešama drauga palīdzība, lai apturētu prāvu.

programme.title: Forsaiti
programme.desc: Stāsts par Viktorijas laikmeta beigu posma ģimenes dzīvi, mīlestību, pārbaudījumiem un triumfu, kad ģimenes locekļiem jāizvēlas starp tradīcijām, ziedošanos, personīgo laimi un mīlestību.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Peregrīnas prieks par gaidāmajām kāzām ātri beidzas, kad stjuaršu apmācības laikā tiek atklāts mirušas sievietes ķermenis.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Kad Kārmodijam izdodas izcili nolikt eksāmenu un viņam piedāvā pētījumu programmu Londonā, Kārmodijs vēlas palikt Skeldeilā. Sigfrīds satraucas, ka viņš tikai kavē Kārmodiju.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Džeims sāk dīvaini uzvesties, kā arī pasliktinās viņa veselība. Pamfrijas kundze iejūtas jaunā lomā, bet Holas kundze satur visus kopā.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Tuvojas Ziemassvētki, un Holas kundzes pasauli satricina sliktas ziņas. Tristanam uztic īpašu misiju, kurā iesaistīti baloži. Māja tiek gatavota Džimija dzimšanas dienai.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Izjūtot spiedienu no mātes, Džeimss Heriots vēlas sekot sapnim, tādēļ izmanto iespēju un dodas uz veterinārārsta asistenta amata darba interviju Jorkšīrā.

programme.title: Inspektors Džordžs Džentlijs
programme.desc: Galvenais inspektors Džordžs Džentlijs, policists ar spēcīgu taisnīguma izjūtu, strādā, lai atrisinātu noziegumus Nortamberlendā. Viņam palīdz jaunais seržants Bakhs.

programme.title: Dalgliešs
programme.desc: Kentas policija meklē sērijveida slepkavu, kurš slepkavo atomelektrostacijas darbinieces. Dalgliešs ierodas, lai izmeklētu iespējamu saikni ar teroristiem.

programme.title: Forsaiti
programme.desc: Stāsts par Viktorijas laikmeta beigu posma ģimenes dzīvi, mīlestību, pārbaudījumiem un triumfu, kad ģimenes locekļiem jāizvēlas starp tradīcijām, ziedošanos, personīgo laimi un mīlestību.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Bijušais detektīvs Karls Albergs pārceļas uz nelielu piekrastes pilsētiņu, lai rastu mierinājumu un saskaras ar virkni slepkavību. Iedzīvotāja slepkavībā Albergs aizdomās tur citu vietējo iedzīvotāju.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Karls Albergs pārceļas uz klusu piekrastes pilsētiņu, jo ir noguris no policijas darba lielpilsētā. Tomēr viņam nākas izmantot visas prasmes, lai izmeklētu slepkavības, kas arvien turpina notikt.

programme.title: Džeina Eira
programme.desc: Bārene Džeina Eira kļūst par guvernanti Tornfīldholā. Pirmo reizi viņa jūtas kaut kur piederīga, tomēr kādā dienā viņu pamodina dīvainas skaņas.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Mis Mārpla iekļūst drauga Sera Henrija Kliteringa džentlmeņu klubā, lai lūgtu palīdzību. Viņai ir pierādījumi par Zilās ģerānijas slepkavību, un nepieciešama drauga palīdzība, lai apturētu prāvu.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Aktrise Marina Grega un režisors un vīrs Džeisons Rads ievācas Gosingtonholā. Kokteiļu vakarā, ko rīkoja šarmantais pāris, fane Hetera izdzer saindētu kokteili.

programme.title: Grāmattārps
programme.desc: Ekscentrisks grāmatnīcas īpašnieks un bijušais spiegs Buks palīdz atrisināt slepkavības. Bijušais ieslodzītais Džeks sāk strādāt veikalā, kur viņu laipni uzņem, tomēr šķiet, ka ne viss ir kārtībā.

programme.title: Komisārs Rikardi
programme.desc: Noslēpumainais policijas inspektors Rikardi ir nolādēts, tomēr viņa lāsts ir visai noderīgs. Viņš var redzēt vardarbīgā nāvē mirušo spokus un dzirdēt viņu pēdējās domas.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Kad laboratorijā tiek noslepkavota viņu galvenā aizdomās turamā doktore Eleina Montgomerija, Peregrīna un Džeimss ir spiesti redzēt, ka viņu slepkavas motīvi ir daudz dziļāki, nekā viņi abi bija uzdrošinājušies uzskatīt.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Peregrīna uzņemas vairāk, nekā spēj paveikt, izmeklējot slepkavību starptautiskā kulinārijas skolā, atklājot korupcijas labirintu, kas ved atpakaļ uz Melburnas policiju.

programme.title: Global Week-End
programme.desc: News stories as they happen. Analysis and coverage of the most important global events as they unfold providing insight into their significance and relevance for communities worldwide. From politics to society all that has an impact or will impact on the globe as a whole is presented in an accessible and insightful form to allow one to keep up-to-date on the factors changing the world we live in.

The UCI (Union Cycliste Internationale) World Tour is made up of 38 events including the three grand tours (Giro dItalia, Tour de France and Vuelta a España), the five classic one-day cycle races known as the Monuments (Milan–San Remo, Tour of Flanders, Paris–Roubaix, Liège–Bastogne–Liège and Giro di Lombardia), further races across Europe as well as stage races in United Arab Emirates, China, Australia and Canada.

Почта
programme.desc: В почтовое отделение на должность экспедитора устраивается Елена (40 лет). Экспедитор Андрей (45) не очень доволен новой напарницей, он не доверяет женщинам за рулем. Но со временем между Еленой и Андреем возникает симпатия. И не без стараний со стороны их детей – Юли и Глеба. Андрей – одинокий папа, Елена - одинокая мама, казалось бы, ничего не может помешать их отношениям… Но тайны и ошибки прошлого сыграют с ними злую шутку… Бушуют страсти и в почтовом отделении. Руководитель отделения Артем (30) покоряет вершины почтовой карьеры и не желает замечать сотрудницу отделения Милану (25), которая мечтает заполучить его сердце. Мама Артема и его младший брат Гена также вносят в жизнь отделения свои коррективы… Все герои ежедневно сталкиваются с нестандартными ситуациями, но не остаются равнодушными к проблемам людей-клиентов почтового отделения, помогая им выпутаться из сложных историй…

programme.title: Remembrance
programme.desc: Remembrance depicts a remarkable love story that blossomed amidst the terror of a German concentration camp in 1944 Poland. This impossible passion fuels the courage of a Polish prisoner who manages to rescue his Jewish girlfriend. Against all odds, they escape the camp and survive a treacherous journey to freedom. But during the chaos of the end of the war, they are forcibly separated and each is convinced that the other has died. More than thirty years later in New York, the happily married 52-year-old woman accidentally finds out that her former Polish lover is still alive. And she has to see him again.

programme.title: The Groomsmen
programme.desc: A groom (Ed Burns) and his four attendants wrestle with issues related to friendship and maturity a week before the big day.

programme.title: Musketeers Forever
programme.desc: A group of ex-secret agents opens a Jazz Club in Las Vegas. When they discover that a local Indian reservation is being threatened by a greedy and powerful gangster, they act. All for one, and one for all!

programme.title: Saving Lincoln
programme.desc: The true story of Abraham Lincoln and his bodyguard, U.S. Marshal Ward Hill Lamon. This unique film features sets created from actual Civil War photographs.

programme.title: Nico the Unicorn
programme.desc: A 12-year-old disabled boy, whose father recently passed away, has his life changed when the pony he rescues gives birth to a unicorn. Can he save the unicorn from the people who want to exploit it?

programme.title: The Adventure Scouts
programme.desc: A coming of age movie about a group of boys and girls called "adventure scouts" who return from a camping trip to discover their small town is being held captive by a gang of motorcycle-riding knuckleheads. Using only their scouting knowledge and camping equipment, the kids take down the gang members one by one, reunite with family members, and restore the communitys sense of pride.

programme.title: No Limit Kids
programme.desc: Ashton, Celeste, and Becca are three unlikely middle school outcasts who form a club in an abandoned theater. There, they meet Charlie (Bill Cobbs, Night at the Museum), a homeless man who shares their passion for musical theater. When the theater is scheduled to be torn down, the teenagers set out to save the landmark with a modern-day performance of Shakespeares Much Ado About Nothing. Along the way, the group learns to treat others with respect and stand up for their beliefs. This Dove-approved film also features Emmy and Golden Globe nominee Lee Meriwether.

programme.title: Foolproof
programme.desc: Kevin, Samantha and Rob live for Foolproof; their own private club where through high-tech, meticulously thought out and executed plans, they pull off the most impossible of heists - all in theory that is. Theyve never actually done it for real. But all that changes when Leo, a cutthroat British gangster, rips off their foolproof plans for a diamond heist and uses it to successfully execute the robbery. Threatening to implicate them, Leo blackmails them to pull off a robbery worth $20 million in corporate bonds.

programme.title: Its a Perfect Night for Suicide
programme.desc: A comedy about a psychic who pretends to believe that magic exists, a gigolo who pretends to believe the psychic, an illusionist who pretends to be somebody else and a desperate woman who believes she will find true happiness in love... when shes dead. Lenka is a psychic who besides telling fortunes is great at depriving her clients of them, with the help of an extraordinary uncle-illusionist. The business flourishes until Lenkas most profitable client, a soulful Buddhist Yvonne, decides to commit suicide. She was jilted by the man of her dreams - Oscar. Whats more, Yvonne wants to leave a suicidal note, pointing to Lenka as the cause of all her misfortunes. Lenkas entire world falls apart. She must dissuade Yvonne from killing herself and in her desperation is ready to use all her magical skills to make Oscar fall in love with Yvonne. However, Lenka doesnt even suspect shes entering the lions den. A dangerous game begins. The full moon is on the rise - and, surprisingly, the magic starts to work for real. It turns out that the scenario written in the stars is not an easy thing to change...

programme.title: Max Cloud
programme.desc: A space cruiser crash lands on the purple planet of Heinous, an intergalactic prison that is home to the most vile and dangerous villains in the galaxy. All of the crew have perished except for its pilot; intergalactic space hero Max Cloud, the ships hapless chef Jake, and its reluctant Commander, Rexy. Their mission is simple, wait inside their vessel until help arrives and try their best to keep the prisoners outside from getting in, however this is Max Cloud and he doesnt do simple. ...But this is not real life. This is a video-game, and at the helm of the adventure is Sarah, a teenage video game fanatic who immerses herself in fantasy to avoid dealing with her less than packed social life and a strained relationship with her dad, straight laced single parent Tony. After a fallout, Tony bans Sarah from playing games and in a frenzy of teenage emotion Sarah makes a wish, that in the blink of an eye becomes a reality... With a flash of pixelated light Sarah is transported into the video game by the mysterious Space Witch, who exists in an etherial void, behind a secret door, that never appears in the same place twice! So Sarah finds herself trapped inside the game and the only person who can help her is her equally socially defunct but incredibly charming friend, Cowboy, who must control Sarah from her bedroom in Brooklyn and keep her from losing her one life, in a game that cant be paused, that they have never finished before! To make matters worse Sarah has not found herself inside the body of the wonderful Max Cloud, but Jake, thats right... the hapless chef. We follow Sarah as she negotiates the terrifying and dangerous planet of Heinous alongside the ever confident Max and fed up Rexy, jumping back and forth with the real world as the pressure mounts on Cowboy and the real stakes start to rise. They soon encounter stranded Bounty Hunter, Brock Donnelly, and realise they must get off the planet before help arrives as the planets surface burns so hot every day that anything not underground is space liquid! AND to add to the stakes Cowboy must keep his best friend away from the evil clutches of the games villain Revengor, a part man, part machine, lunatic who is hell bent on taking Max Clouds ship and with an army of prisoners and an evil sorcersss called SHEE, his chances look pretty damn good. The action bounces between the video game and the real world as Cowboy and Sarah must come together to get her home, all leading to the ultimate showdown in Revengors lair, where back in Brooklyn, video game expertise arrives in the form of a very unlikely hero. Sit down. Plug in. Its time to play THE INTERGALACTIC ADVENTURES OF MAX CLOUD.

programme.title: Rat Race
programme.desc: Donald P. Sinclair has placed six separate gold coins in different slot machines in his casino. The lucky six who find these coins discover an opportunity of a lifetime. The chance to own $2 million. Locked up in a locker in New Mexico, these six contestants must now race each other, to be the first to the cash. There are no rules in place and everything that could possibly happen, does. Whilst, behind the scenes, Sinclairs associates are placing their bets.

programme.title: The Humanity Bureau
programme.desc: In the near future our government will decide who is expendable.

programme.title: Noble Things
programme.desc: Jimmy Wayne Collins finds himself adrift in Memphis, Tennessee. Forced to return home to the piney woods of Southeast Texas, Jimmy will face his imprisoned brother, his dying father and the demons he left behind.

programme.title: The Last Day of August
programme.desc: Dan (Michael Izquierdo) was paralyzed just over a year ago. Following months of recovery and overwhelmed by lifes new realities, he retreated to a family cabin in upstate New York. On the last day of August, his closest friends arrive unannounced to confront him about his recent reclusive and self-destructive behavior. Wanting to support him, yet skeptical of his psychological health, they attempt the tight-rope walk of loving confrontation in the hopes of convincing Dan to return home. Friendships are tested and love reveals itself in this independent drama about breaking down and breaking through. "The Last Day of August" is about the enduring power of love and friendship, and the struggle to overcome the mental and physical barriers that confront those living with addiction and disability. How we react to tragedy defines us, and when loved ones grapple with immense personal suffering, its not always apparent how to respond and whether the help we have to give is the help thats truly needed. This film is a personal examination of how destructive behaviors such as substance abuse and self-isolation emerge from trauma, and how one finds the strength to overcome.

programme.title: My Son, My Son, What Have Ye Done
programme.desc: Inspired by a true crime, a man begins to experience mystifying events that lead him to slay his mother with a sword.

programme.title: Guido Superstar: The Rise of Guido
programme.desc: An Italian immigrant is thrust into the world of drug-lords, supercars and secret agents in this hilarious action comedy. After losing his job at the Disco Valet Company for undue heroism, Guido (Silvio Pollio) must pose as a Sicilian gangster for the FBI in order to infiltrate a powerful Asian gang. Things go sour and take a turn for the worse. Guido must now make amends before he is discovered and killed, or worse, deported.

programme.title: Unknown Energies, Unidentified Emotions
programme.desc: A hybrid of animated, experimental, feature and genre film in found footage technique, with a radio phonic sound and of unexpected, almost 40-minute duration. Journalist Isidor Dukas visits the Institute for Research on Psychic Phenomena and Mental Film when a confrontation with one of the test subjects transforms a routine check into a never-ending maze. Barićs work calls into question issues surrounding artistic practices in the digital age including ideas about authenticity, simulation/replication and appropriation.

programme.title: Suits on the Loose
programme.desc: Two rebellious teens, on the run from a desert survival camp, steal the car of two naive Mormon missionaries. They end up in New Harmony, the town thats been anxiously awaiting their Mormon missionaries.

programme.title: Score: A Hockey Musical
programme.desc: Seventeen-year-old Farley has led a sheltered life, raised on a diet of home schooling, organic living and trips to the art gallery. To his parents dismay, Farley loves to play hockey with the local kids. To their even greater dismay, Farley is scouted and signed by the owner of a junior league team, where he becomes an instant star. But Farley discovers that stardom comes with a price - including the expectation to fight on the ice. Throw in a changing relationship with his best friend, and Farley finds himself losing his way.

programme.title: Scout Camp
programme.desc: Sixteen-year-old York Hayes, leader of the Fire Dragon Scout Troops, returns to Camp Rahuta for his final scout camp. York has decided to take the best step of his life.

programme.title: Field of Lost Shoes
programme.desc: Based on a true story of the American Civil War, culminating at the Battle of New Market, May 1864. A group of teenage cadets sheltered from war at the Virginia Military Institute must confront the horrors of an adult world when they are called upon to defend the Shenandoah Valley. Leaving behind their youth, these cadets must decide what they are fighting for.

programme.title: Corner Office
programme.desc: As Orson, The Authoritys newest employee, finds himself trapped in the absurdities of corporate life, his alienation deepens when he discovers a room hes told doesnt exist.

programme.title: 10 Things We Should Do Before We Break Up
programme.desc: Abigail, a self-sufficient single mom meets Ben. They both think every great relationship ends in disaster. On the first date they come up with 10 things to do together before they break up. But the estimated end is not so sure - because fate adds #11 to their list.

programme.title: Cookies Fortune
programme.desc: Cookies Fortune unfolds over an eventful Easter weekend in the small town of Holly Springs, Mississippi. The town residents are peaceful, kind folk--with the exception of Camille Dixon (Glenn Close) - a pushy theatre director with an incredibly shy younger sister, Cora (Julianne Moore), whose estranged daughter Emma (Liv Tyler) has just returned to town. On the heels of her latest play, Camille is shocked to discover that her Aunt Jewel Mae "Cookie" Orcutt (Patricia Neal) has committed suicide. Terrified at the thought of how this will tarnish the family name, she eats the suicide note to make it look like a burglary. This set-up leads the police to one main suspect, Willis Richland (Charles S. Dutton), who also happens to be Cookies best friend. Although the rest of the town is convinced Willis didnt commit the crime, an outside investigator (Courtney B. Vance) isnt so sure. As Easter Sunday and opening night of the play arrive, the truth comes out, revealing more secrets than anyone could have possibly imagined.

programme.title: Land Of the Blind
programme.desc: A soldier recounts his relationship with a famous political prisoner attempting to overthrow their countrys authoritarian government.

programme.title: The Zodiac
programme.desc: THE ZODIAC takes a different look at the famous Zodiac Killer case from other screen treatments of the murders. More than a simple crime story, the film is an emotional thriller focusing on the murders impact on victims, their families and the wider community. The film follows a police detective and his son who become obsessed with the murders and endanger their family in the process.

programme.title: The Quest
programme.desc: Christopher Dubois embarks on an odyssey of self-discovery that spans the globe. Kidnapped and enslaved by gun smugglers, sold by pirates and thrust into the murky underworld of gambling and kickboxing, Chris journey takes him to forbidding Muay Thai Island where deadly martial arts are taught, the colonial splendor of British East Asia, the dank back alleys of Bangkok, desolate deserts once trodden by the warriors of Genghis Khan and finally, the ancient Lost City. There he must face the ultimate test of his manhood in the fabled Ghang-gheng, the ancient winner-take-all competition in which the deadliest fighters from around the world employ the most spectacular feats of martial arts skills ever displayed in order to win the prized Golden Dragon. But fighting prowess alone will not be enough for Chris to triumph over such daunting foes. He must reach deep inside and access all of the determination, strength of character, and sense of selfless honor within in order to triumph over ...

programme.title: Laika patruļa
programme.desc: "Laika patruļa" stāsta par Laika aģentu, kura dzīve ir nebeidzams ceļojums laikā, lai uzveiktu visus šķēršļus, kas stājas likuma sarga ceļā. Pēdējais uzdevums, kas aģentam uzticēts, – notvert noziedznieku, kas līdz šim pamanījies izsprukt sveikā cauri laiku laikiem.

programme.title: Algotnis
programme.desc: 23 gadīgais Mičs zaudējis savu līgavu teroristu uzbrukumā ir apsēsts ar atriebību. Viņš uzsāk apmācības specvienības rotā, lai atrastu un nogalinātu tos, kuri ir atbildīgi par viņas līgavas slepkavību. Par viņa instruktoru tiek nozīmēts Aukstā kara veterāns, ar kuru kopā viņi izmeklēs it kā savstarpēji nesaistītus teroristu uzbrukumus. Izmeklēšana viņus aizvedīs uz pēdām izbijušam CIP aģentam, kurš ir apmāts ar kara uzsākšanu Tuvajos austrumos.

programme.desc: Saulains velobrauciens cauri Lahemā.

programme.title: Supergriboši
programme.desc: Jebkurā parastā skolā Setu, Evanu un Fogeli sauktu par jefiņiem. Starp citu - tā pieņemts uzskatīt arī viņu skolā. Sets spēj runāt un domāt tikai par seksu, Evans ir pārāk jauks un godīgs, bet Fogelis ir vienkārši katastrofa. Katram no viņiem ir sava sapņu meitene un lieli dzīves plāni, taču parasti viņi pavada laiku, skatoties porno un graužot popkornu vai cepot dārzā desiņas kopā ar vecākiem. Līdz brīdim, kad Seta pielūgtā meitene uzaicina viņus uz tīņu ballīti, dodot līdz šim svarīgāko uzdevumu viņu dzīvē - sagādāt alkoholu.

programme.title: Divas Megijas
programme.desc: Policijas priekšnieks Sanderss izmeklē divu sieviešu ar vienādu vārdu dīvainās slepkavības un atšķetina mazpilsētas melu tīklu. Viņš satiek un ātri iemīlas Ritā - ziņkārīgā kaimiņienē, kura vēlas palīdzēt atrisināt noslēpumu.

programme.title: Tev pienācis pasts
programme.desc: Grāmatu lielveikala magnāts Džo Fokss un neatkarīgā grāmatu veikala īpašniece Ketlīna Kellija iemīlas interneta anonimitātē. Abi svētlaimē pat neapzinās, ka viņš cenšas viņu izsist no biznesa.

programme.title: Novembris
programme.desc: 2015. gada novembrī Parīzi piemeklē virkne nepieredzētu nāvējošu uzbrukumu. Heloīzes un viņas galvenā komandiera Freda vadītā pretterorisma vienība ir spiesta cīnīties ar laiku, lai notvertu vainīgos pirms tie pastrādājuši jaunu šaušalīgu uzbrukumu.

programme.title: Visa pasaules nauda
programme.desc: Kad sešpadsmitgadīgais Džons Pols Getijs III tiek nolaupīts, viņa izmisusī māte Geila lūdz jaunekļa vectēvu, naftas magnātu, samaksāt izpirkumu. Kad miljardieris Getijs atsakās, Geila visiem spēkiem mēģina viņu pārliecināt, jo dēla nolaupītāji kļūst arvien brutālāki. Kamēr zēna dzīvība karājas mata galā, negaidīti par Geilas sabiedroto šajā cīņā kļūst Getija konsultants Flečers Čeiss, bijušais CIP darbinieks.

programme.title: Brauciet ar ērgli
programme.desc: Leifam pēc atsvešinātās mātes Hanijas nāves palicis mantojums. Pirms viņš var pārcelties uz viņas gleznaino Josemītu namiņu, puisim jāizpilda viņas sarežģītais un dažreiz apšaubāmais darbu saraksts.

programme.title: Džeina Ostina sabojāja manu dzīvi
programme.desc: Agate - burvīga un pretrunu pilna, nonāk izmisīgā vienatnē. Viņas sapnis ir piedzīvot mīlestību, kura līdzinās Džeinas Ostinas romānam un viņas galvenais mērķis ir kļūt par rakstnieci. Tā vietā, viņa pavada savas dienas pārdodot grāmatas leģendārā britu grāmatnīcā Parīzē.

programme.title: Sauc mani savā vārdā
programme.desc: 1980. gadu Itālijā starp 17 gadus veco studenti un vecāku vīrieti, ko meitenes tēvs noalgojis par savu asistentu, uzvirmo mīlestība.

programme.title: Zoe Bakes
programme.desc: During hot weather, Zoë stays cool by making an icebox cake with chocolate wafers and caramel cream, and a no-bake British dessert called a posset.

programme.title: Bakers Dozen
programme.desc: All About The Bread. The bakers decorate beautiful gingerbread houses. Guest judge and focaccia artist Teri Culletto challenges the finalists to make a bread art masterpiece!

programme.title: House Of Knives
programme.desc: The intensity is sky high as the chefs cook handheld dishes to survive a surprise twist of potential double elimination.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: Owning and operating a restaurant is hard graft, harder than many believe it to be. Long hours, stiff competition, and no guarantees that customers will frequent; for many budding restaurateurs, the dream often turns into a nightmare. This American reality series follows English celebrity chef Robert Irvine as he attempts to save failing restaurants from the brink of collapse. With just two days to turn it around on a measly budget of $10,000, he gets to straight to work identifying and altering the businesses weaknesses before a grand re-opening. Can he achieve the seemingly impossible and create a food establish that is set to succeed?

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Halloween Baking Championship
programme.desc: Seven courageous bakers are tasked with creating terrifying desserts in this spooky baking competition. Hosted by ventriloquist Jeff Dunham and his sidekick Walter, the competition invites talented bakers to showcase their talents in Halloween-themed challenges. They will have to conjure all of their baking abilities if they are to become the champion, and the winner of the series takes home a frightening $25,000. With a number of prominent judges overseeing their work, there is no room for error, and contestants are eliminated each week until only one remains.

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh is a cookbook author who combines her country lifestyle with her Jewish and Chinese heritage to create the most delicious new dishes. A former big city girl, Yeh is multi talented, a successful blogger and classically trained musician, its food that ultimately stole her heart. Learn lots of tricks and tips with Yeh as she cooks up her personal favourite recipes for every occasion, from family visits to brunch with the girls to a classic farm supper! This show is an absolute treat.

programme.title: Cake Boss
programme.desc: Carlos Bakery in Hoboken New Jersey create elaborate, elegant and interesting edible art cakes. Cake Boss follows the team, led by Buddy Valastro, as they design and create two of these masterpieces for all kinds of events and occassions. The show explores the intricacy of working with your family, and their interpersonal relationships with other employees. Watch as they create everything from classic wedding cakes to alien spaceships.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods
programme.desc: Travel and cuisine documentary series, hosted by famous Andrew Zimmern, American culinary expert, chef, restaurateur and television personality and spin-off series of Bizarre Foods, focuses on classic, iconic foods (not bizarre like in the original series) from some well-known destinations- moussaka and real Greek yogurt from Athens, sweet macarons and crepes from Paris, Italian gelato, gooey fondue to Swiss chocolate from Zurich, mile-high pastrami sandwiches and bagels from NYC, and many other legendary foods. The show will explore where these dishes came from, how theyre prepared, and the best way to enjoy them. Andrew will also discover some secrets and interesting stories behind these epic meals.

programme.desc: Owning and operating a restaurant is hard graft, harder than many believe it to be. Long hours, stiff competition, and no guarantees that customers will frequent; for many budding restaurateurs, the dream often turns into a nightmare. This American reality series follows English celebrity chef Robert Irvine as he attempts to save failing restaurants from the brink of collapse. With just two days to turn it around on a measly budget of $10,000, he gets to straight to work identifying and altering the businesses weaknesses before a grand re-opening. Can he achieve the seemingly impossible and create a food establish that is set to succeed?

programme.title: Bizarre Foods
programme.desc: Travel and cuisine documentary series, hosted by famous Andrew Zimmern, American culinary expert, chef, restaurateur and television personality and spin-off series of Bizarre Foods, focuses on classic, iconic foods (not bizarre like in the original series) from some well-known destinations- moussaka and real Greek yogurt from Athens, sweet macarons and crepes from Paris, Italian gelato, gooey fondue to Swiss chocolate from Zurich, mile-high pastrami sandwiches and bagels from NYC, and many other legendary foods. The show will explore where these dishes came from, how theyre prepared, and the best way to enjoy them. Andrew will also discover some secrets and interesting stories behind these epic meals.

programme.title: 24 In
programme.desc: Shift 8: Elevation. In the final hours of the competition, the chefs must cook the best dishes of their lives for a chance at 50,000 and an unforgettable trip to Hawaii.

programme.title: Nāve bērēs
programme.desc: Kad kuplas britu ģimenes tēvs mirst, tiek sarīkotas grandiozas bēres. Tomēr tajās haosu izraisa kāds vīrs, kam esot zināmi tumši noslēpumi par aizgājēju. Šantāžists ir gatavs saglabāt ģimenes reputāciju, viņa vārdiem sakot, par mazu summu, bet ar daudzām nullēm.

programme.title: Balerīna
programme.desc: Slepkava, apmācīta Ruska Roma organizācijas tradīcijās, dodas atriebt tēva nāvi.

programme.title: Eilīna
programme.desc: Eilīna strādā zēnu pāraudzināšanas iestādē. Kad kolektīvam pievienojas jauna psiholoģe, Eilīnai ar viņu rodas īpašs kontakts. Bet viņu attiecības pavisam drīz uzņem grēcīgu pavērsienu.

programme.title: Mirušie nesāpina
programme.desc: Divi pionieri Amerikas pilsoņu kara laikā frontē cīnās par savu dzīvību un mīlestību.

programme.title: 10 dzīvības
programme.desc: Lutināts kaķis Bekets par pašsaprotamu uzskata laimīgo lozi, kas viņam iedalīta, kopš viņu izglāba un iemīlēja Roza, labsirdīga un aizrautīga studente. Kad kaķis zaudē savu devīto dzīvību, liktenis iejaucas, lai viņu aizvestu pārmācošā piedzīvojumā.

programme.title: Nejaukais es
programme.desc: Superļaundaris Gru ir izmests no darba, jo neapturēja jaunāko cilvēces apdraudētāju. Viņš zaudē dzīvesprieku, bet to atgūst, kad uzzina, ka viņa neredzētais dvīņubrālis Dru vēlas viņu satikt. Gru ar ģimeni dodas uz brāļa grezno dzīvesvietu. Brāļi kopā uzsāks cīņu pret Baltazaru Bretu, kurš bērnībā bija slavenība, taču tagad kļuvis par superļaundari, kurš terorizē pasauli. Minioni uzsāk protesta streiku pret to, ka Gru vispār neinteresē iespēja valdīt pār pasauli.

programme.title: Grāmatu zagle
programme.desc: Filma "Grāmatu zagle", kuras pamatā ir pasaulē populārs romāns, ir stāsts par neparastu, enerģisku meiteni, kuru Otrā pasaules kara laikā Vācijā nosūta dzīvot audžuģimenē. Meiteni ieintriģē vienīgā grāmata, ko viņa paņēmusi līdzi, tāpēc viņa sāk kolekcionēt grāmatas. Ar savu jauno vecāku un zem kāpnēm mītošā slepenā viesa palīdzību meitene iemācās lasīt un izveido brīnumainu pasauli, kas iedvesmo viņus visus.

programme.title: Strāvas karš
programme.desc: Dramatisks sāncensības stāsts par elektrības atklāšanas laikmeta titāniem Tomasu Edisonu un Džordžu Vestinghausu, lai noskaidrotu, kura izgudrotā elektriskā sistēma būs noteicošā modernizētajā pasaulē.

programme.title: Žanna Dibarī. Karaļa favorīte
programme.desc: Stāsts par karaļa Luija XV pēdējo oficiālo mīļāko Dibarī kundzi.

programme.title: Vīrs, vārdā Oto
programme.desc: Stāsts par nīgru atraitni, vārdā Oto Andersons, kura vienīgais prieciņš ir ķīvēšanās ar izmisušajiem kaimiņiem un viņu kritizēšana. Kad viņam blakus durvīs ievācas kāda jauna ģimene, asprātīgajā grūtniecē Marisolā viņš sastopas ar līdzvērtīgu pretinieku. Šī satikšanās izvēršas par negaidītu draudzību, kas apvērsīs Oto pasauli kājām gaisā.

programme.title: Singstrīta
programme.desc: Dublina, 1985. gads. Ekonomiskā krīze Īrijā arvien vairāk cilvēku iedzen bankrotā, tikmēr 15 gadus vecais Konors kopā ar brāli un māsu dzīvo pie vecākiem, kuru laulībai draud izjukšana. Lai ietaupītu naudu, Konoram nākas mainīt skolu. Tur viņš ātri vien kļūst par izstumto. Kādu dienu viņš pamana Rafīnu, kura šad tad stāv iepretim skolai, raudzīdamās tālumā un smēķēdama vienu cigareti pēc otras. Viņa ir skaista, divus gadus vecāka par Konoru, viņai ir draugs, un viņa strādā par modeli. Īsāk sakot: viņa ir gandrīz nesasniedzama. Taču Konors nav gatavs padoties un piedāvā meitenei piedalīties viņa grupas videoklipā. Rafīna piekrīt, un Konors ir panikā, jo grupas viņam nemaz nav...

programme.title: Atmiņas par nākotni
programme.desc: 1914. gadā, laužot pieņēmumus par sievieti tā laika sabiedrībā, Vera Britena kļūst par Somervilas koledžas studenti Oksfordā. Sākoties Pirmajam pasaules karam, viņas brālis Edvards, līgavainis Rolands Leitons un draugi Viktors un Džefrijs tiek nosūtīti cīnīties frontes priekšējās līnijās. Arī Vera ziedojas un atstāj koledžu, lai dotos līdzi un pievienotos brīvprātīgo mediķu organizācijai, rūpējoties par ievainotajiem un mirstošajiem kareivjiem Londonā, Maltā un Francijā.

programme.title: Zagļu medības 2: Pantera
programme.desc: Lielais Niks atkal ir medībās – šoreiz Eiropā, un viņš jau tuvojas Donijam, kurš ir iesaistījies bīstamajā dimantu zagļu pasaulē un bēdīgi slavenajā "Panteras" mafijā. Viņi plāno grandiozu laupīšanu pasaulē lielākajā dimantu biržā.

programme.title: Gambīts
programme.desc: Mākslas kuratoram Harijam Dīnam ik dienu nākas paciest sava līdz ausīm bagātā priekšnieka Laionela ekscentriskās izdarības. Nu viņš plāno atriebties, taču šim uzdevumam viņam ir vajadzīga karstasinīgas rodeo karalienes Pīdžejas palīdzība. Harijs liek senam draugam izgatavot pazudušas Monē gleznas kopiju un pamudina priekšnieku to "nejauši" ievērot. Ja darījums izdosies, Harijs un viņa līdzdalībnieki būs par dažiem miljoniem mārciņu bagātāki.

programme.title: Māceklis
programme.desc: Stāsts par meistaru un viņa mācekli Ņujorkas nekustamo īpašumu džungļos. 70. gadu sākumā Donalds Tramps ir iesācējs – kompleksu mākts lietu kārtotājs, kurš atrodas tētuka Trampa seniora pavēnī. Iepazīstoties ar advokātu Roju Konu, viņa dzīve mainās. Zogot no citiem idejas, spārnotus teicienus (arī no Reigana) un pārņemot Kona taktiku, Tramps kļūst par savu "labāko versiju". AIDS epidēmija, šovbiznesa ziedonis un itāļu marmora modernās pilis. Pilsēta, kas nekad neguļ, ir Trampa spēļu laukums – tiesa, tajā viņam pašam kļūst par šauru.

programme.title: Krauklis
programme.desc: Dvēseles radinieki Ēriks Dravens un Šellija Vēbstere tiek nežēlīgi nogalināti. Saņemot iespēju upurēt sevi un glābt savu mūža mīlestību, Ēriks dodas ceļā, šķērsojot dzīvo un mirušo pasauli, lai atriebtos un izcīnītu taisnību.

programme.title: Kapteinis Zobenzobs un burvju briljants
programme.desc: Ļaunais princis Megans Hans no džungļiem un Karību jūras pirāts kapteinis Zobenzobs jau sen dzen maģiskā briljanta pēdas. Tas nav parasts dārgakmens. Pusnaktī tas spēj piepildīt viskvēlāko vēlēšanos, lai kāda tā būtu. Visi meklējumi "kaķim zem astes", taču tad, klejodams pa džungļiem, burvju dārgakmeni nejauši ierauga mazais Marks.

programme.title: Alvins un burunduki
programme.desc: Komponists Deivs jau krietnu laiku cenšas gūt panākumus mūzikas nozarē. Lai gan viņa bijušais studiju biedrs ir ticis augstā amatā kādā ierakstu kompānijā, Deivam nekādi neizdodas sasniegt mērķi. Stāvoklis kļūst cerīgāks, kad Deivs iepazīstas ar trim dziedošiem burundukiem, kas slēpjas Ziemsvētku eglītē ierakstu kompānijas galvenajā ēkā.

programme.title: Marija
programme.desc: Marija Kallasa, pasaulē izcilākā operdziedātāja, pavada savas dzīves pēdējās dienas 1970. gadu Parīzē, saskaroties ar savu identitāti.

programme.title: Relikviju mednieki
programme.desc: Patiess stāsts par vērienīgākajām dārgumu medībām pasaules vēsturē. Pārsteidzoša Otrā pasaules kara karavīru komanda saņem pavēli izglābt nacistu nozagtos mākslas šedevrus un atgriezt tos īstajiem īpašniekiem. Uzdevums šķita neizpildāms, jo mākslas darbi atradās aiz ienaidnieka līnijas, un Vācijas armijai bija pavēlēts pēc Reiha krišanas iznīcināt absolūti visu. Vai tad muzeju direktori, kuratori un mākslas vēsturnieki, kuri labāk pārzināja Mikelandželo darbus, nevis ieročus, varēja cerēt uz izdošanos?

programme.title: Trakās ķepas. Leģenda par Henku
programme.desc: Henks varbūt ir necils suns, taču viņš ir apņēmības pilns kļūt par samuraju. Suņuks dodas uz valsti, kur čum un mudž no kaķiem. Tur Henks satiek nejauko kaķu karavadoni Iku Ču un arī Džimbo, kurš reiz bijis varens samurajs. Džimbo paņem Henku savā paspārnē un iemāca viņam, ko īsti nozīmē būt samurajam. Dzimstot pirmajai īstajai draudzībai starp kaķi un suni, abiem nākas glābt Kakamučo no ļaunā Ika Ču.

programme.title: Pie visa vainīga mīlestība
programme.desc: Žoslēns ir veiksmīgs biznesmenis, toties mīlas dzīvē – patmīlīgs brunču mednieks. Kad viņš mēģina jau atkal savaldzināt jaunu sievieti, izliekoties, ka ir ratiņkrēslā, viņa iepazīstina Žoslēnu ar savu māsu, kura patiešām piesaistīta dzīvei ratiņkrēslā.

programme.title: Es gribu dejot. Vitnijas Hjūstones stāsts
programme.desc: Līksms, emocionāls un sirdi plosošs ieskats Vitnijas Hjūstones, visu laiku labākās RandB stila popa dziedātājas, dzīvē un mūzikā, sākot no paša sākuma līdz mūzikas jomas slavas zālei.

programme.title: Džeisons Borns
programme.desc: Bijusī CIP slepenā aģente Nikija Pārsone (Džūlija Stailza) reiz palīdzēja Bornam (Mets Deimons), pēc tam nozuda un šobrīd strādā kopā ar ziņotāju, kurš gatavojas nodot atklātībā CIP slepenās specoperācijas. Nikija ielaužas CIP sistēmā un lejupielādē visu, kas saistīts ar specoperācijām, tostarp operāciju "Dzirnakmens", kurā piedalījās Borns. CIP aģente Hetera Lī (Alīsija Vikandere) atklāj ielaušanos un par to ziņo CIP direktoram Robertam Dūvijam (Tomijs Lī Džonss), kurš ir specoperāciju galvenais vadītājs.

programme.title: Nolīdzināt līdz ar zemi
programme.desc: Divi policisti tiek atbrīvoti no darba pēc tam, kad atklātībā nonāk video, kurā abi pārinieki pielieto spēku, lai saņemtu atzīšanos no aizdomās turamā. Nespēdami atrast citu nodarbošanos, viņi dodas peļņā kriminālajā sfērā, kur par viņu galveno ienaidnieku kļūst nesen no cietuma iznākušais un atriebību policijai alkstošs noziedznieks.

programme.title: Killera sievas miesassargs
programme.desc: Miesassargs Maikls Braiss beidzot var atviegloti uzelpot. Trakais killers Dariuss Kinkeids, kurš piebeidzis veselu baru ļaužu visā pasaulē, nu ir nozudis. Saule, mīļākā grāmata un ne domas par Kinkeidu – ko gan vēl varētu vēlēties, lai atgūtu formu. Taču tad pludmalē uzrodas līdz matu galiem apbruņotā Kinkeida sieva Sonja, un viņai ir sliktas ziņas – Kinkeids ir Itālijā, viņu nolaupījuši teroristi un tie ir jāiznīcina!

programme.title: Es, Tonija
programme.desc: Tonija ir izcila maita. Un par visu vairāk pasaulē viņa dievina sliktos puišus, stipras cigaretes un pati sevi. Un vēl viņa ir ASV čempione daiļslidošanā un gatavojas doties uz Olimpiskajām spēlēm. Ir tikai jātiek vaļā no konkurentes – un šajā sakarā Tonijai viss ir jau izplānots.

programme.title: Basketbols: NBA Action. 3503. raidījums
programme.desc: Interesting sports magazine that gives viewers a chance to find out all the latest NBA news, and see all the exciting action and top highlights from the matches.

programme.title: EuroLeague. Paris Basketball - FC Bayern Munich
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.title: UFC. Fight Night: Gabriel Bonfim vs Randy Brown
programme.desc: Martial Arts based TV programme. UFC stands for the Ultimate Fighting Championship which is an American mixed martial arts (MMA) promotion company based in Las Vegas that is owned by William Morris Endeavour.The purpose of UFC fighting was to establish the most effective martial art in a contest that had no weight classes and minimal rules that were as follows: no biting, hair pulling, groin shots and eye gouging. Legendary fighters well known for their ability to win in UFC fighting are Anderson Silva, Brock Lesnar, Connor McGregor and Ken Shamrock. Womens MMA has seen Ronda Rousey defend her title from 2012 to 2015 before she was defeated by Holly Holm another belt holder in more than one martial art.

programme.title: EuroLeague. Olympiacos Piraeus - Partizan Mozzart Bet Belgrade
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

Buyers usually have an overall budget of under $200,000 with at least $30,000 in renovations.

programme.desc: American Pickers is an American reality series that follows ingenious "pickers" Mike Wolfe, and his business partner, Frank Fritz, as they hunt down objects with historical, collectible and pop culture value. They travel around the United States to buy or "pick" various items for resale, for clients, or for their own personal collections. Danielle Colby is in charge of their office of Antique Archaeology.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: In Storage Wars show a team of professional buyers will prove that for a good buy you need more than certain sum of money. When rent is not paid on a storage locker for a certain period, the contents can be sold as a single lot of items in the form of an auction. The best experts are fighting for containers contents, hundreds of thousands of dollars are sometimes in the game. Every participant has only some minutes to inspect the contents, and that only without entering the storage room, just looking inside. Each purchase can become a win or a loss, and nobody knows exactly whether they are buying real treasures or garbage.

programme.title: The Secret of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Rivaling the famous Area 51 in Nevada for UFO sightings and paramormal activity, is the lesser known, but equally fascinating, Uinta Basin in Utah and, in particular, Skinwalker Ranch. For the first time, a team of scientists and experts have been granted unlimited access to the infamous and secretive 512-acre property in order to unlock the mysteries of more than 200 years of UFO activity, bizarre animal mutations and preternatural phenomena. Making good use of state-of-the-art tecnology such as drone thermography, ground-penetrating radar and lasers, the team apply their knowledge and expertise to make shocking discoveries.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: The Curse of Oak Island is an active reality television series that focuses on the Oak Island mystery. There are numerous mystical stories of buried treasure and unexplained objects on or near this enigmatic island in Nova Scotia. Since the 19th century several attempts have been taken to locate treasure and artifacts there, some people even lost their lives trying to read this riddle. The Lagina brothers, Rick and Marty, were so impressed by this legend that they decided to try their luck and start this dangerous mission with the help of modern technologies and machinery. They are hammering at finding whatever is there, hidden deep under the ground, taking no notice of the fact that so far not even one research has ended up successfully.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: Non-fiction series explores all kinds of mysterious things and objects, hosted by William Shanter. William draws viewers attention to numerous enigmatic things in our life- unexplainable events, bizarre rituals, strange creatures, things of the mind, evil places. There are stories about deadly forests and mountains from where people do not return, voodoo and exorcism, premonitions that come true, and hosts favorite story about a man who starts to play the piano like a concert pianist after emergence from coma.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. More than once everything unusual and most unbelievable have eventually turned out to be real. So this version can be fairly realistic- intelligent life forms from other galaxies visited the Earth millions years ago. They brought most advanced game-changing technologies, that changed the course of history. It makes us think again about the descent of man and modern progress of humankind. Strange drawings have been found in the caves, portraying runways in Peru and Indian texts have been deciphered, describing "flying machinery", called gods.

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: Join host Tony Harris as he investigates the most mysterious content ever captured and attempts to unearth the truth. Employing the assistance of experts and state-of-the-art technology, Tony is determined to decipher whether these photos, videos and audio recordings of purported supernatural and paranormal events are falsified or for real. He meets with eyewitnesses, conducts tests and stops at nothing to determine the truth.

programme.title: Hazardous History With Henry Winkler
programme.desc: Remember when childhood came with a side of danger? Think back to the outrageous toys and daredevil playground antics that once defined growing up, as we uncover (literally) explosive science kits, high-flying kite tubes, and more.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: The Curse of Oak Island is an active reality television series that focuses on the Oak Island mystery. There are numerous mystical stories of buried treasure and unexplained objects on or near this enigmatic island in Nova Scotia. programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Pawn Stars reality show is about every day routine at Gold and Silver Pawn Shop based in Las Vegas, Nevada. It is a family business, three generations of Harrison family are buying and then selling unique objects that are of considerable historical, artistic or other cultural value. The main purpose is to make a profit which means separate the wheat from the chaff, have a keen scent for one-of-a-kind authentic items and recognize fake stuff as well as appraise items value flawlessly. It is absolutely breath-taking to watch the Harrisons run their shop, it is a mixture of psychological skills and business activity. Who would have thought that this ordinary, at first glance, job could be so jaw-droppingly fascinating.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens: Origins
programme.desc: Ancient Astronaut theorists Giorgio Tsoukalos, William Henry, and Jason Martell reveal the most compelling evidence of ancient flying machines and explore the possibility that these extraterrestrial encounters have persisted throughout the ages.

programme.title: Cities of the Underworld
programme.desc: Historical documentary series that visits a range of diverse modern cities including Istanbul, New York, Rome, London, Cairo, and Sydney. By travelling underneath the streets and roads we use today, we learn about the fascinating pasts and ancient secrets of these incredible places.

programme.title: Gold Hunters: Legend of the Superstition Mountains
programme.desc: Reality show that follows a group of modern day treasure hunters who search for the Lost Dutchman mine in the Superstition mountain range of Arizona. The promise of a $200 million has lured thousands of treasure hunters for years. Hunting for the Lost Dutchman is typically a one-man journey, but lifelong seeker Wayne Tuttle is breaking tradition and partnering with a team of experts to follow a newly revealed clue that could finally solve the 500-year-old mystery of Americas most famous and deadliest buried treasure. They will encounter many real life dangers on their adventure, leaving you on the edge of your seats in each episode.

programme.title: River Hunters
programme.desc: Documentary series in which YouTube sensation Beau Ouimette, an experienced river detectorist, teams up with presenter Rick Edwards, to search the UKs rivers and waterways in an attempt to find underwater archaeological treasures. The pair wil visit some of the most historically significant sites across Britain, where some iconic events and battles took place. By using state-of-the-art technology, archive maps and contemporaneous accounts from the period, they will find various artefacts under layers of silt and rocks, which they will take to local archaeologists and historians to uncover the stories behind the finds.

programme.title: The Universe
programme.desc: Documentary series that features computer-generated imagery and computer graphics of astronomical objects in the universe as well as interviews with experts of cosmology, astronomy, and astrophysics. It has been fifty years since the man traveled to outer space, but there are too many secrets unrevealed. The series reconstructs life on other planets and galaxies, fantasizes about life and all its possible forms in other atmospheres. You can witness space accidents, parallel universe, the velocity of light and discover new facts about mysterious outer space.

programme.title: Where Did It Come From?
programme.desc: Documentary series exploring the history of Earths greatest man-made structures and creations. Where Did It Come From? reveals the earliest examples of brilliance and ingenuity from past pioneers. From the Roman highway project; a civil engineering feat establishing a network of unprecedented highways, to Egypts iconic structures, this series reveals the incomprehensible ides brought to life by magnificent minds, and in some cases, brutal slavery. Join host Michael Guillen as he dives into this fascinating world of both civil and social engineering, born out of ideas we still use today.

programme.title: The Curse of Civil War Gold
programme.desc: The Curse of Civil War Gold is a non-fiction series about American Civil War history. Michigan native, part time treasure hunter Kevin Dykstra and his team search for lost treasures of Civil War Gold, estimated to be worth millions of dollars. They join forces with Marty Lagina from The Curse of Oak Island trying to solve the mystery and find the lost gold. The story goes that Union soldiers tracked down Confederate president Jefferson Davis in 1865 and confiscated his gold. Later it was smuggled north and ended up in Lake Michigan. And this is exactly where Kevin and his crew head to.

programme.title: Unidentified: Inside Americas UFO Investigation
programme.desc: This documentary series features testimony from Luis Elizondo, former military intelligence official and Special Agent In-Charge at the Pentagons mysterious program, The Advanced Aerospace Threat Identification Program (AATIP). This secretive military department was tasked with researching and investigating Unidentified Aerial Phenomena (UAP) which included numerous video clips, three of which were released to a shocked public in 2017. In this six-part series, Elizondo speaks out about his concerns for national security and the Pentagons lack of response to these potential threats. Episodes include fighter pilots from the USS Nimitz describing their terrifying encounter with a UFO; the lights seen in the sky above a New Jersey turnpike; and a saucer-shaped craft observed over Chicagos OHare airport.

programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. programme.title: Search for the Lost Giants
programme.desc: Search for the Lost Giants follows two brothers on their quest to find lost giants. According to the Bible there were ancient giants wandering along the Earth. A few years ago some Freemasons found stone structures and corridors underground that indicated a lost civilization. The brothers Bill and Jim Viera are looking for evidence of missing bones from ancient skeletons that are suspected to have clocked in at over seven feet tall.

programme.title: Chasing Mummies
programme.desc: Reality series following the adventures of Egyptologist Dr Zahi Hawass and his team as they search for the secrets of ancient Egypt. Travelling across this fascinating country, Dr Zahi Hawass and his crew embark on a historical and archaeological expedition – and try to preserve important artefacts.

programme.title: Warriors
programme.desc: The Romans, with the greatest army in the world, are annihilated by Germanic tribes at the Battle of Teutoburg Forest. Go inside the culture of some of the most famous warriors to explore their weaponry, tactics and, ultimately, their psyche.

programme.title: Ross Kemp: Deep Sea Treasure Hunter
programme.desc: Have a look at the history series and its four episodes telling us how Ross Kemp, presenter and journalist, is making his life-long dream come true. Neil Brock is his personal guide and dive supervisor providing him a special intensive training course. Expert divers Emily Turton and Mallory Haas accompany Ross along his exploration around various parts of the UK.

programme.title: Mankind Decoded
programme.desc: Using dramatic reconstructions, this fascinating documentary series explores the evolution and advancement of the human race, dissecting the key events and changes that have affected and altered various civilisations. Each episode in this 12-part series focusses on a unique transformation of our ancestors, as they discovered more and more about the planet they inhabit. With expert historians offering explanations to these changes, the series reveals how powerful forces of nature compelled humans to adapt, the birth of war, the discovery of fire and metals, and the building of giant structures, among many others.

programme.desc: Host Brad Meltzer and viewers are on the hunt for lost and stolen history, including an historic plaque commemorating Alex Haleys Roots. Plus: an original copy of the Bill of Rights, and a mysterious ring worn by Lee Harvey Oswald.

programme.title: Brad Meltzers Decoded
programme.desc: Best-selling author, Brad Meltzer is a political thriller novelist, who has now scoured records of the most revered institutions in America. The likes of the US Supreme Court, the secret service, Wall Street and the presidency have come under Meltzers microscope, as he awakens dormant theories, codes and stories as he uncovers secrets of the organisations. Joined by a top team of investigative researchers, join Meltzer as he decodes some of Americas most perplexing mysteries.

programme.title: The Curse of Civil War Gold
programme.desc: The Curse of Civil War Gold is a non-fiction series about American Civil War history. Michigan native, part time treasure hunter Kevin Dykstra and his team search for lost treasures of Civil War Gold, estimated to be worth millions of dollars. They join forces with Marty Lagina from The Curse of Oak Island trying to solve the mystery and find the lost gold. The story goes that Union soldiers tracked down Confederate president Jefferson Davis in 1865 and confiscated his gold. Later it was smuggled north and ended up in Lake Michigan. And this is exactly where Kevin and his crew head to.

programme.title: In Search Of Aliens
programme.desc: In Search Of Aliens is an American TV series following Giorgio Tsoukalos, a writer, ufologist, television presenter and producer. He is a proponent of the pseudoarchaeological theory that ancient alien astronauts interacted with ancient humans. He takes the viewers on a paranormal journey, suggesting that aliens made contact with primitive humans long time ago and there is such evidence as Indian Sanskrit texts, describing flying machines called Vimanas; Jewish Zohar writings describing a "manna machine" similar to chlorella algae processing of today and many more. He explores the fascinating evidence behind the Earths most famous mysteries.

programme.title: Highway To Hell
programme.desc: This true crime series examines the hidden deadly dangers that lurk on the more than 160,000 miles of Americas highways. A playground for the opportunistic killer, Americas open roads pose unknown threats in the shape of the car that overtakes you, the truck speeding up behind you, or the customer sitting at the next booth in a roadside diner. Each episode deals with a specific case such as that of Dr. Gulam Moonda and his wife, Donna who are approached by a gunman at the side of the road; Diana Franklin, who abandons her car in mysterious circumstances; and trucker Bob Nelson, the discovery of whose body sparks a 15-year manhunt.

programme.title: Evil Twins
programme.desc: In this true-crime documentary series we reveal heinous acts committed by evil twins. A well-studied, natural phenomenon, many people believe twins have a unique bond that is unexplainable by science. These intriguing siblings share a womb, identical DNA and, in many cases, similar personalities. We explore the chilling crimes these maniacal twins have committed, occasionally against each other. Each episode focusses on a different crime and tries to understand the motive behind the madness. Murder cases, thefts, city-running gangsters; we explore copious different cases that have involved twin siblings.

programme.title: The Dead Files
programme.desc: The American paranormal television series focuses on investigations by retired homicide detective Steve DiSchiavi and psychic communicator Amy Allan. The two never communicate during investigation, they study the cases of crimes separately, and only coming to certain conclusions compare their results. Their methods of work are completely opposite: Steve uses common sense, documents, talks to real people, and Amy relies on her sixth sense and her ability to communicate with ghosts and spirits.

programme.title: Help! My House Is Haunted
programme.desc: Created by Ghost Adventures Zak Bagans, star of the popular US paranormal show, Help My House Is Haunted is a ghost-hunting series where paranormal investigators search for paranormal entities. Some familiar faces like Barri Ghai, founder of The Ghostfinder Paranormal Society and and the shows investigator and paranormal tech expert, as well as world renowned psychic Chris Fleming join Jayne Harris, Paranormal Researcher. They travel the UK and visit houses and petrified families troubled by hauntings, and using the latest technology try to capture never before seen proof of the paranormal.

programme.title: Help! My House Is Haunted

programme.title: Ghost Bait
programme.desc: Enter the paranormal world of Bob Magill and Tina Storer, two pioneering investigators who delve into mysterious hauntings and happenings across the United States. Both Bob and Tina experienced ordeals with ghosts at a young age, and used these frightening encounters to learn how to overcome their paranormal fears. In this reality series they help frightened citizens do the same. Following Bobs unique methods, they conduct investigations in homes where residents are adamant they are haunted. They use their findings to heighten their clients sense of fear, in turn drawing out the entities that prey on anxiety. Bob And Tina show their clients that the only way to tackle these forces is to embrace their fears.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Ghost Hunters is an American paranormal and documentary reality TV series. The hosts are Jason Hawes and Grant Wilson, plumbers by day, paranormal investigators by night. They are in charge of TAPS- The Atlantic Paranormal Society- a group of ordinary people interested in getting to the bottom of otherworldly disturbances. Together with their team Jason and Grant research supposed paranormal activity, from Mason, Ohios Kings Island amusement park to the Philadelphia Zoo. The purpose of the show is not to prove that a place was haunted, but the opposite. There is a healthy dose of scientific approach in each investigation.

programme.title: Hometown Homicide
programme.desc: Hometown Homicide is a documentary crime series dedicated to investigations of cold blooded murders in small towns and communities. The investigators are looking for the killer in a place where everybody knows everybody but keeps silent. This series makes us realize that small communities can hide dark secrets and the killer can live just next door. Sometimes its hard to believe that the stories are based on facts.

programme.title: Ольга
programme.desc: Юрген сбежал от знахарки, у которой Гриша оставил его лечиться от алкоголизма. Ольга и Гриша не знают где его искать. Алина продолжает внаглую подкатывать к Андрюхе, и Лена решает помочь ему, показав, что "на каждую долбанашку есть поопытней долбанашка". Тимка жалуется Тото, что в школе к нему придирается училка из-за того, что он азербайджанец.

programme.title: Детство Шелдона
programme.desc: История о непростом детстве вундеркинда Шелдона Купера. Родители юного гения не разделяют увлечения сына наукой: его мать очень религиозна, а отец, бывший футбольный тренер, предпочитает проводить вечера в компании пива и телевизора. Со сверстниками тоже не ладится, ведь Шелдона куда больше детских игрушек интересует, где можно взять обогащённый уран для научных экспериментов.

programme.title: Детство Шелдона
programme.desc: История о непростом детстве вундеркинда Шелдона Купера. programme.title: Детали
programme.desc: Как мясо выращивают в биореакторе? NASA готовится ко второй и третьей частям лунной программы. Как найти место на карте без числовой системы координат? Космическая "уборка": чем грозит скопление мусора на околоземных орбитах?

programme.title: Ольга
programme.desc: Лена в депрессии из-за того, что её "все мужики кидают". Ольга как может успокаивает сестру, предлагает пойти, "залить кисляк вином". Алина, после ночи на даче, начинает практически преследовать Андрюху. Юрген очень хочет вернуться в семью, но понимая, что Ольга его не простит, решает действовать через Гришу, прикинувшись смертельно больным.

programme.title: Ольга
programme.desc: Юрген сбежал от знахарки, у которой Гриша оставил его лечиться от алкоголизма. Ольга и Гриша не знают где его искать. Алина продолжает внаглую подкатывать к Андрюхе, и Лена решает помочь ему, показав, что "на каждую долбанашку есть поопытней долбанашка". programme.title: Азия
programme.desc: Что вы знаете о Центральной Азии? То, что эти страны когда-то входили в состав СССР, и то, что люди сейчас там живут бедно, живут в кишлаках и ездят на ослах, мечтают переехать в Россию и работать там, пьют только зеленый чай и едят плов и мясо, притесняют людей других национальностей? Мы решили развеять самые распространенные мифы о Центральной Азии, а также рассказать о забытых традициях и блюдах, которые шокируют иностранцев, а иногда даже самих местных.

programme.title: Неизвестная Россия
programme.desc: В Дубне, городе физиков-ядерщиков, нашлось место и лирикам. Таинственный уличный художник разрисовал заборы и стены, превратив скучные городские пейзажи в бесконечную картинную галерею. В лицо его знают немногие. И лишь некоторым знакомо прозвище дубненского Бэнкси — Боб Макар.

programme.title: Друзья
programme.desc: Шестеро друзей - Рейчел, Моника, Фиби, Джоуи, Чендлер и Росс - живут по соседству, вместе убивают время, делятся секретами и иногда очень сильно влюбляются.

programme.desc: Екатерина в разводе, и с помощью танцев хочет отвлечься, чтобы пережить предстоящий переезд в Англию дочери и внука, ставших смыслом ее жизни. Кассирша Марина мечтает выйти замуж и родить ребенка. А финансист Рита пришла в танцевальный зал по совету психолога, чтобы спасти свой брак. Девушки отправляются учиться танцевать ча-ча-ча к лучезарному и неотразимому преподавателю Александру. Только мало кто знает, что и у Александра в жизни тоже не все так празднично, как кажется на первый взгляд.

programme.title: Ча-ча-ча
programme.desc: Екатерина в разводе, и с помощью танцев хочет отвлечься, чтобы пережить предстоящий переезд в Англию дочери и внука, ставших смыслом ее жизни. Кассирша Марина мечтает выйти замуж и родить ребенка. А финансист Рита пришла в танцевальный зал по совету психолога, чтобы спасти свой брак. Девушки отправляются учиться танцевать ча-ча-ча к лучезарному и неотразимому преподавателю Александру. Только мало кто знает, что и у Александра в жизни тоже не все так празднично, как кажется на первый взгляд.

programme.title: Ча-ча-ча
programme.desc: Екатерина в разводе, и с помощью танцев хочет отвлечься, чтобы пережить предстоящий переезд в Англию дочери и внука, ставших смыслом ее жизни.
